title: Bug 103963: No friendly error message when there is no data for series
OB: When there is no data for a series, there is no error message displayed.
EB: When there is no data for a series, a friendly error message should be displayed to remind the user.
SR:
1. Create a chart and set data definition. 
2. Select a column without data. 
3. Check if a friendly error message is displayed.
